text: Thanks Chelsea! For the introductions we were just thinking it’d be great to get everyone on the members channel (I think I can do that as an admin) and then initiate a round of people introducing themselves, perhaps adding some fun fact/more personal spin than just names/lab/research interests (but we didn’t have much inspiration yesterday.. :sweat_smile:). So it would basically just entail writing a welcome message inviting everyone to introduce themselves and then starting it off (we’ll all follow suit as well :))
